definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
a hero with no chance of using his might/to have no opportunity to display one's talents
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 wu2 yong4 wu3 zhi1 di4

definition: useless person (originally from Zhuangzi's "A Happy Excursion" 逍遙遊|逍遥游)

sentences.english: Arts and Humanities, we are told, are useless for the making of technological innovation.
sentences.chinese: 我們被教導說藝術與人文對於技術革新是無用的。

sentences.english: No longer would his darling’s candle be extinguished by his useless tears.
sentences.chinese: 寶貝女兒的蠟燭再也沒有被他無用的眼淚熄滅過。

sentences.english: It is useless for a girl to quarrel with fate because she is not a boy.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子因自己非男孩而自怨命苦是無用的。

sentences.english: The room is lumbered up with useless articles.
sentences.chinese: 房間時堆滿了無用的東西。

sentences.english: They weeded out useless books from library.
sentences.chinese: 他們從圖書室裏淘汰無用的書。

sentences.english: Speed up boot time by disabling unused ports on your Windows machine.
sentences.chinese: 停用你機器上的無用的接口使電腦運行速度加快。

sentences.english: It was useless to continue such a barren argument.
sentences.chinese: 繼續這種毫無結果的爭論是無用的。

sentences.english: “That doesn’t mean the rest of the pixels are useless,” Ma cautions.
sentences.chinese: “這並不意味着其餘的像素是無用的”，馬毅說。

sentences.english: But ye are forgers of lies, ye are all physicians of no value.
sentences.chinese: 你們是編造謊言的，都是無用的醫生。

sentences.english: The buyers were left with worthless holes in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 購買者收到的僅僅是地面上一個毫無用途的大坑。

sentences.english: These items give us the fantasy of safety and wellbeing, and little else.
sentences.chinese: 這些東西給我們除了健康和安全的幻想幾乎毫無用處。

sentences.english: The act of deleting; removal by striking out.
sentences.chinese: 器清除等方法消除無用數據的過程。

sentences.english: Are you willing to fuel such useless reprimands to fight against?
sentences.chinese: 你願意燃料等無用斥責打擊？

sentences.english: There is much pleasure to be gained from useless knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 從無用的知識之中可以得到那麼多樂趣。

sentences.english: Nagging serves no useful purpose for preventing puppy love.
sentences.chinese: 沒完沒了的說教對於防止孩子們早戀毫無用處。

definition: one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
